statements: UPDATE trader_profiles SET email='john.doe@example.com', first_name='John', last_name='Doe' WHERE trader_id=1;
UPDATE trader_profiles SET last_name='Smith', email='jane.smith@example.com', preferences='{
color_preference':'blue','product_preference':'shoes'}' WHERE trader_id=2;
UPDATE trader_profiles SET first_name='John', last_name='Doe', email='john.doe@example.com', preferences='{"theme": "dark", "notifications": true}' WHERE trader_id=101
UPDATE trader_profiles SET email='jane.smith@example.com', preferences='{"theme": "light", "notifications": false}', last_name='Smith', first_name='Jane' WHERE trader_id=202
UPDATE trader_profiles SET first_name='Alice', last_name='Smith' WHERE trader_id=1001;
UPDATE trader_preferences SET risk_tolerance='Medium', investment_horizon='Long Term', preferred_assets='Stocks, Bonds', trading_strategy='Buy and Hold' WHERE trader_id=2002;
UPDATE trader_profiles SET first_name='John', last_name='Doe', email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE trader_id=1;
UPDATE trader_preferences SET risk_tolerance='High', investment_horizon='Long Term', preferred_assets='Stocks, ETFs', trading_strategy='Value Investing' WHERE trader_id=1;
UPDATE TraderProfiles SET first_name = 'John', last_name = 'Doe' WHERE trader_id = 1;
UPDATE TradingRecommendations SET confidence_level = 0.75, recommendation = 'Buy AAPL' WHERE trader_id = 2;
UPDATE TraderProfiles SET first_name='John', last_name='Doe' WHERE trader_id=1001;
UPDATE TraderPreferences SET preference_value='High' WHERE trader_id=1002 AND preference_category='Risk';
UPDATE traders SET first_name='John', last_name='Doe' WHERE trader_id=1;
UPDATE preferences SET preferred_sectors='Technology, Finance', risk_tolerance='Moderate' WHERE trader_id=3;
UPDATE traders SET first_name='John', last_name='Doe', phone_number='+123456789', date_of_birth='1990-05-15' WHERE trader_id=1;
UPDATE preferences SET risk_tolerance='High', investment_horizon='Long-term', preferred_sectors='Technology, Finance', preferred_assets='Stocks, ETFs' WHERE trader_id=1;
UPDATE trader_profiles SET name='John Doe', age=35 WHERE id=1;
UPDATE trading_recommendations SET recommendation_text='Buy AAPL stock', confidence_score=4.5 WHERE id=3;
UPDATE trader_profiles SET name='Alice', age=30 WHERE id=1;
UPDATE trading_history SET trade_type='SELL', trade_amount=500.25 WHERE trader_id=2 AND symbol='AAPL';
